title: Desktop-only LilyCard hover background flush horizontal edges

requirements.summary: Adjust LilyCard hover background layer to remove horizontal inset at lg+ while preserving vertical inset and existing hover behavior.
acceptanceCriteria: On viewports >= `lg`, hovering a lily card shows the hover background flush to the card's left and right edges (no horizontal inset).
On viewports >= `lg`, the hover background still keeps the existing vertical inset and rounded corners.
On viewports < `lg`, the hover background remains unchanged (still inset on all sides as it is currently).
No other page/container/layout spacing is changed outside of the LilyCard hover background layer.

file_operations.description: Update the inset hover background layer Tailwind classes to use separate x/y insets: keep the current vertical inset (e.g., inset-y-2) at all sizes, keep the current horizontal inset on <lg (e.g., inset-x-2), and override at lg+ to remove horizontal inset (e.g., lg:inset-x-0). Preserve existing rounded corners, opacity transition, pointer-events-none, and z-index; do not change any other layout or spacing.
